info.title: entity-persistence-service
info.description: A flexible REST backend working with MongoDB, and adaptable data modeling for efficient development. Part of the Tarcinapp Suite.

200.description: Array of child Entity model instances
Array of List model instances through Entity
Array of parent Entity model instances

get.description: Returns system uptime, application start time, current server time, and all environment-based configuration settings. Sensitive values like database passwords are masked.

_validFromDateTime.description: This is the approval time.Only those records with validFromDateTime property has a value can beseen by other members.If caller is not a member at the creation time, this field is filledautomatically by the server.

_validUntilDateTime.description: This field indicates if the rcord is currently active.

_createdDateTime.description: This field is filled by server at the time of the creation of the record.

_visibility.description: public: anyone can see the record if validFromDateTime has a value. protected: only owner groups can see. private: only owner users can see.

_relationMetadata.description: Contains the relation metadata for the record
